definition: experienced person/an old hand at sth

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: She's really an old hand to hop the plane.
sentences.chinese: 她可真是一個偷乘飛機的老手了。

sentences.english: Experienced professionals want to transition to the career of their dreams.
sentences.chinese: 久經歷練的老手希望轉行做自己夢想的工作。

sentences.english: I often think my old phone will make people laugh.
sentences.chinese: 我經常認爲我的老手機會惹人笑話。

sentences.english: The con artist bamboozled her out of $600.
sentences.chinese: 那騙人的老手騙走了她600美元。

sentences.english: They appeared to be speed dating veterans and had lots of advice.
sentences.chinese: 他們看起來個個都是速配老手，給了我不少忠告。

sentences.english: Victor is a fortune hunter form Quebec.
sentences.chinese: 維克托是來自魁北克獵豔老手。

sentences.english: If you have any questions about this, ask Martha. She's an old hand.
sentences.chinese: 關於此事你若有任何問題，可向瑪莎請教，她是老手。

sentences.english: Tiger Woods is an experienced golf master.
sentences.chinese: 老虎吾茲是高爾夫球界的斫輪老手。

sentences.english: My client is an experienced driver of more than 20 years.
sentences.chinese: 我的當事人是一個有20多年駕齡的老手。

sentences.english: She shakes her head wearily, like a battle-hardened wedding veteran.
sentences.chinese: 她像一個身經百戰的婚禮老手一樣疲倦地搖搖頭。

sentences.english: I think he believes he is invincible.
sentences.chinese: 他自認爲自己是情場老手。

sentences.english: Her husband is an incorrigible flirt .
sentences.chinese: 她的丈夫是個積習難改的調情老手。

sentences.english: Making these decisions can be overwhelming–even if you’re a veteran.
sentences.chinese: 即使是一名老手，你也無法迴避要做決定這件事。

sentences.english: Complete season mode on legend difficulty.
sentences.chinese: 以老手的困難度成季後比賽模式。

sentences.english: Say a sentence to disappoint you of words, maybe he was a romantic veteran.
sentences.chinese: 說句讓你掃興的話，沒準他是個風月老手。

sentences.english: Whether you are a pro or just learning the waves are ideal.
sentences.chinese: 不管你是老手還是新手，這裏的水浪都非常理想。

definition: a much-travelled person, well acquainted with the ways of the world
novice/new hand/sb new to a job
lit. veteran of a hundred battles (idiom)/fig. experienced/seasoned
lit. an easy drive on a familiar path (idiom); fig. experience makes progress easy/a task that is so familiar one can do it with one's hand tied behind one's back
